hero.description: Access premium travel equipment from trusted local community members.

home.categories_subtitle: Find equipment suitable for your travel adventure

featured.label: FEATURED PRODUCTS
featured.title: Discover Premium Travel Equipment
featured.empty_desc: No products available right now. Please check back later!

why_pira.title: Why Choose PIRA?
why_pira.subtitle: Join thousands of travelers and equipment owners trusting PIRA for rental needs
why_pira.benefit1_desc: From cameras to camping gear to specialty equipment, everything you need is in your area.
why_pira.benefit2_desc: Verified reviews, user ratings, and supportive community
why_pira.benefit3_desc: Save money by renting instead of buying. Discover amazing experiences at great prices.

testimonials.title: Trusted by Travelers Worldwide
testimonials.subtitle: See what our community says about their PIRA experience
testimonials.review_1: PIRA made my travel amazing! Easy to rent, owner was supportive.
testimonials.review_2: Great service, high-quality equipment. Will use PIRA again.
testimonials.review_3: Easy-to-use interface, secure payment. Very satisfied with the experience.

cta_bottom.heading: Ready to Start Your Adventure?
cta_bottom.description: Join PIRA today and discover a world of travel possibilities with high-quality equipment from our trusted community.

createProduct.addressReason: Address: Renters know the product location and distance
createProduct.trustReason: Increases your credibility and reputation with customers
createProduct.helpSubtitle: Detailed guide to successfully create products
createProduct.aiVerificationDesc: Our AI system automatically checks images to ensure content is appropriate and matches your selected category.
createProduct.pricingTipsDesc: Research prices for similar products in your area. Set competitive daily rental rates and reasonable deposit amounts.
createProduct.photoGuideDesc: Use high-quality images with good lighting. Take multiple angles and include close-ups of important details.
